specification.title: Enhanced Conversions for Leads - Implementation Troubleshooting Protocol

support_continuity_requirements.case_number_consistency: Must be referenced in all communications (e.g., 7-5170000038434)
support_continuity_requirements.client_id_inclusion: Required in all technical meeting invites
support_continuity_requirements.stakeholder_inclusion: All relevant parties must be included in meetings

support_handoff_protocol.issue: Gaps created when representatives transition (Solomiya → Ally → Patrick)

troubleshooting_escalation.when_to_escalate: Generic support responses for complex technical implementations
